languages.text: {n}Темноволосый отвечает спокойной улыбкой.{/n} "Вас дезинформировали, Ваша Светлость — вы пришли сюда как уважаем{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я}, пусть ликование и охватывает наши сердца при мысли, что столь высокая персона чтит нас своим вниманием".

{n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."
languages.original_text: {n}Темноволосый отвечает спокойной улыбкой.{/n} "Вас дезинформировали, Ваша Светлость — вы пришли сюда как уважаем{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я}, пусть ликование и охватывает наши сердца при мысли, что столь высокая персона чтит нас своим вниманием".

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}黑发男子带着愉悦的笑容回应道。{/n}“想必您是误会了，大人，您是作为尊贵的客人参加会议的。愿我们的心中充满喜悦，因为如此尊贵的大人竟然如此看重我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑发男子带着愉悦的笑容回应道。{/n}“想必您是误会了，大人，您是作为尊贵的客人参加会议的。愿我们的心中充满喜悦，因为如此尊贵的大人竟然如此看重我们。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}黒髪の男は悲痛な笑みを浮かべて答える。{/n}「あなたは誤解されておられるようだ、陛下。あなたはここに、誉れある賓客として招かれているのです。このような高貴なお方が我々に敬意を表してくださっていることに、我々の心は歓喜に打ち震えているのですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}黒髪の男は悲痛な笑みを浮かべて答える。{/n}「あなたは誤解されておられるようだ、陛下。あなたはここに、誉れある賓客として招かれているのです。このような高貴なお方が我々に敬意を表してくださっていることに、我々の心は歓喜に打ち震えているのですよ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}El hombre de pelo oscuro responde con una sonrisa alegre.{/n} «Se equivoca, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Viene como invitad{mf|o|a} de honor, llenando nuestros corazones con alegría al ver que una persona tan importante nos honra con su atención».
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre de pelo oscuro responde con una sonrisa alegre.{/n} «Se equivoca, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Viene como invitad{mf|o|a} de honor, llenando nuestros corazones con alegría al ver que una persona tan importante nos honra con su atención».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}L'homme aux cheveux noirs vous répond avec un sourire enjoué.{/n} « Il semblerait que l'on vous ait mal {mf|informé|informée}, Votre Seigneurie. Vous êtes ici en tant qu'{mf|invité|invitée} d'honneur, et c'est le cœur empli de joie que nous acceptons l'intérêt que nous porte une personne aussi noble. »
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme aux cheveux noirs vous répond avec un sourire enjoué.{/n} « Il semblerait que l'on vous ait mal {mf|informé|informée}, Votre Seigneurie. Vous êtes ici en tant qu'{mf|invité|invitée} d'honneur, et c'est le cœur empli de joie que nous acceptons l'intérêt que nous porte une personne aussi noble. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Der dunkelhaarige Mann reagiert daraufhin optimistisch lächelnd.{/n} "Ihr seid falsch informiert worden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} – Ihr seid als Ehrengast hergekommen, möge also Jubel unsere Herzen ausfüllen, dass uns eine so vornehme Persönlichkeit mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Anwesenheit beehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der dunkelhaarige Mann reagiert daraufhin optimistisch lächelnd.{/n} "Ihr seid falsch informiert worden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} – Ihr seid als Ehrengast hergekommen, möge also Jubel unsere Herzen ausfüllen, dass uns eine so vornehme Persönlichkeit mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Anwesenheit beehrt."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Siyah saçlı adam neşeyle gülüyor.{/n} "Yanlış bilgilendirilmişsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Siz buraya onur konuğu olarak geldiniz. Böylesi değerli bir şahsın bizi ilgisiyle onurlandırması, yüreklerimizi sevinçle dolduruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The dark-haired man responds with a sanguine smile.{/n} "You have been misinformed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — you have come here as an honoured guest, may jubilation fill our hearts that such a lofty personage is honouring us with {mf|his|her} regard."

traits.locale_text: {n}Siyah saçlı adam neşeyle gülüyor.{/n} "Yanlış bilgilendirilmişsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Siz buraya onur konuğu olarak geldiniz ve böylesi değerli bir şahsın bizi ilgisiyle onurlandırması yüreklerimizi sevinçle dolduruyor."
traits.speaker: Mercy
